actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to require the reduction of the rate of compensation of Senators, Representatives, and Cabinet officers by the percentage by which nontrust fund outlays of the U.S. Government exceed nontrust fund receipts during a fiscal year.

summary.text: Congressional-Cabinet Salary Control Act - Requires the reduction of the rate of compensation of Senators, Representatives, and Cabinet officers by the percentage by which nontrust fund outlays of the United States Government exceed nontrust fund receipts during a fiscal year.

titles.title: A bill to require the reduction of the rate of compensation of Senators, Representatives, and Cabinet officers by the percentage by which nontrust fund outlays of the U.S. Government exceed nontrust fund receipts during a fiscal year.
